title: Welcome to BorderPass
subtitle: Let's create your personalized travel profile. This journey will only take a few minutes and will help us understand your unique travel needs.

title: What's your full name?
subtitle: Please enter your legal name as it appears on your passport or official travel documents.

title: What's your email address?
subtitle: We'll send your personalized BorderPass profile and travel insights to this address.

title: How often do you travel internationally?
subtitle: Select the option that best describes your travel frequency over the past few years.

title: What's your primary reason for traveling?
subtitle: Choose the purpose that represents most of your international trips.

title: Which regions have you visited recently?
subtitle: Select all continents you've traveled to in the past 5 years. This helps us understand your travel experience.

title: How would you rate your typical airport experience?
subtitle: Consider factors like security wait times, customs processes, and overall efficiency.

title: Any suggestions for improving international travel?
subtitle: Share your thoughts on customs, immigration, technology integration, or any aspect of the travel process. Your insights help shape the future of travel.
